price: Fún ẹni tí ó bá fẹ́ nínú yín láti tẹ̀ síwájú tàbí láti fà sẹ́yìn (nínú ẹ̀ṣẹ̀).
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
